name: Bleach: Hanatareshi Yabou
synopsis: Bleach: Hanatareshi Yabou is the 2nd Bleach game to be released for the PS2. The game is a sub-story of the manga. The player can encounter original characters from the series. In addition, secrets and extras can also be unlocked. The gameplay is similar to old-school RPGs where you have a turn-based battle system and travel around towns/overworld map on a quest.
